name: Natasha_Multi_Target_Tutorial
_source: speak;Anna;There are certain weapons that can target multiple enemies.|For example Natasha's Frost Wand here can <red>select up to 2 enemies.</>|An item will tell you in the discription if you can select multiple targets.|There are some weapons that let you <red>select the same target multiple times.</>|So keep an eye out.|Also another thing to note is that <red>enemies cannot retaliate against multi-target attacks.</>|So make most of it!;;;;6
